title: Change type of rest client timeout properties to Duration

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

Unlike most other "*-timeout" properties in Quarkus (you can filter them at https://quarkus.io/guides/all-config), the rest-client configuration has "read-timeout" and "connect-timeout" properties of type `long`. This should be changed to the `Duration` type to be consistent with other extensions.

```
quarkus.rest-client."config-key".connect-timeout
quarkus.rest-client."config-key".read-timeout
```

### Implementation ideas

We could also make the default values of the rest client timeout properties depend on some global timeout properties. See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/15191 or https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/15056.
